episodes.title: 14 members of religious group convicted in 8-year-old’s death
episodes.description: This Week on True Crime News The Podcast: A judge delivers justice for Elizabeth Struhs after her parents and additional members of a fringe religious sect are convicted in the girl’s painful and entirely preventable death. Rich McHale joins host Ana Garcia. To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

episodes.title: Alleged ‘Zizian’ cult linked to four slayings in three states
episodes.description: Police link an alleged cult called the “Zizians” to the slaying of four people, including landowner Curtis Lind, parents Richard and Rita Zajko, and Border Patrol Agent David Maland. The arrest of Jack Lasota, the suspected cult leader, unveiled what investigators claim is a bi-coastal crime spree tied to the group. Ashleigh Banfield joins host Ana Garcia. To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

episodes.title: The Teen Vampire Cult of Kentucky – True Crime After Dark Podcast
episodes.description:
Sixteen-year-old Roderick “Rod” Ferrell was convinced he was actually a 500-year-old vampire. In 1996, Rod and four members of his vampire cult went to Florida on a recruiting trip and would never return the same.

episodes.title: Cult leader found mummified, eyes missing; Dad murdered in Malibu while camping with kids - TCDPOD
episodes.description:
This week on True Crime Daily The Podcast: Authorities find the mummified body of a suspected cult leader in a Colorado residence, decorated with lights and makeup and set up in a shrine (2:09). And a California man was shot to death while camping in a state park with his two young daughters in 2018. The New Yorker writer Dana Goodyear discusses her coverage of a string of shootings in the Malibu hills and the homicide, the subject of her "Lost Hills" podcast (18:53). Plus an update to the Suzanne Morphew case in Colorado (57:43). Dana Goodyear joins host Ana Garcia.

LOST HILLS Podcast:

episodes.title: Ex-cult leader killed children, claiming she saved them from the devil; Alexis Murphy update -TCDPOD
episodes.description:
This week on True Crime Daily The Podcast, we celebrate our 100th episode! An ex-cult leader has been sentenced to 30 years in prison for the starvation and abuse of two children in the 1980s (2:19). And the body of Alexis Murphy has been found seven years after her disappearance, and six years after her killer was convicted (32:23). Alison Triessl, Dr. Judy Ho, Loni Coombs and Luis Bolaños join host Ana Garcia.

episodes.title: ‘Cult Mom’ Lori Vallow’s kids found dead on husband’s property; Toddler dead in dumpster - TCDPOD
episodes.description:
In this week's podcast: Lori Vallow’s children had been missing for months, but the search for them is officially over. Authorities confirmed that they found the bodies of 17-year-old Tylee Ryan and 7-year-old Joshua “JJ” Vallow on the property of Vallow’s husband, doomsday author Chad Daybell (0:55). Plus, in Waco, Texas, 35-year-old Laura Sanchez has been charged with first-degree felony injury to a child. Her 2-year-old son, Frankie Gonzales, was found deceased in a dumpster (27:56). With guest Alison Triessl.
 
Alison Triessl Law: http://www.alisontriessllaw.com/
 
Ana Garcia: http://www.anagarciatv.com/
